title: What is up with these 5 ADC comps
body: And every single one of them rushing Ghostblade and Duskblade. A 5 ADC comp is not a balanced comp and should not perform better than the norm (not trying to bend to the meta but come on, 5 ADCs?)

replies.body: Blame the koreans for making mf support a thing. Seriously, it is garbage.

It's actually like one of the top 5 supports in the LCS right now, up there with Zyra and Karma and such

It's because her gratuitous bases and bonkers AP scalings (for a friggin pen ADC that is) allow her to bully pretty much everyone not named Zyra and Braum out of lane

Dont forget about her Gratuitous Bonkers

That may have been the worst joke i have ever done. But it was worth it.

> [{quoted}](name=THE RlVER KlNG,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ELV90s3p,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-02-15T21:59:23.306+0000)
>
> It's actually like one of the top 5 supports in the LCS right now, up there with Zyra and Karma and such
> 
> It's because her gratuitous bases and bonkers AP scalings (for a friggin pen ADC thatis) allow her to bully pretty much everyone not named Zyra and Braum out of lane

i thought mf countered zyra?

Its a "skill" matchup. 

MF still dies (as does her ADC) if she get rooted, so it isnt a sure counter. It requires both you and your support to not get hit Zyra's skillshots, which isnt always easy - if it were easy, Blitz would be the easiest to counter in the game. MF does outrange Zyra outside of her plant poke, and the plants alone wont win you lane unless you stand next to them ignoring them. However, due to Zyra being extra squishy + running no MR, MF's base damages hit pretty hard. MF definitely has the advantage in the poke war.

It also requires you to have some sort of setup ADC if you arent getting jungle help. You can run Ashe, Jhin, or Varus pretty well, and its an easy kill post 6 if you can lock Zyra down for even a second. You cant run a low-range ADC like Vayne or Lucian (Sivir is okay since she just pushes so well from range) with a MF support and hope to survive vs a decent Zyra. Also, the opposite is also true - if the enemy has an Ashe, Jhin, or Varus to engage at 6, youre pretty much dead as an MF support. Other ADCs work like any other poke lane - if you get enough poke down you win. If not, you lose. 

The problem with running a high damage threat as a support is still there. You generally are left with a low engage, low peel teamcomp. Zyra only became a meta support since she has so much disengage in her kit.
It is a skill matchup, but it favors MF heavily, and is why she is regarded as a Zyra counter. The reason MF support is strong is purely because of how strong utility adcs, and zyra are
"ADC IN 2K17" whiners coming when they get deleted by an assassin for trying to solo push a lane by themselves.
It's season 6 all over again. But hueh: ADC in 2017! Herp-di-dhuuuurp!!!!

Literally nothing changed. 
The only thing was colossus on tanks and jungle being overpowered and suddenly adcs are the worst class in the game absolutely useless blablabla. This game would be SO SO SO much better if riot would stop catering towards these fuckin adcs. 
But oh well after 2 adc overhauls we'll get a third soon until only adcs are played everywhere.

"ADC ins 2017 LUL"

Yea, go funk yourselves ADC mains

Well, don't even try to argue that ADCs problem is solved, it seems like now they're op just because lethality is, the problem with adcs is the crit itemization, but at the least now we have some agency earlygame
5 ADC's? that a sure fire way to lose.
Just get a nautilis/maokai/othertankmeta and an assassin that whatever else in the middle and that comp is gone.
Used to be that a Talon could handle 5 ADCs on his own, as long as they didn't have {{champion:22}} or a lucky {{champion:67}} .
I can't see this comp doing well VS any competent lockdown-and-burst comp.

I was probably exaggerating a bit, I think I'm a bit salty over, 3 ADC comps

Edit : 2nd game now, 4 ADCs
LETHALITY

OK guys, we're going to make armour pen slightly weaker early and slightly stronger late. What's that, no one's buying it? Buff it back up to what it used to be early with the same late game scaling. It's broken? Who'd have guessed?
Good thing that Rengar or Kha'zix can't buy lethality items with their bonkers scaling and still blow me up.

Don't get salty, 
get Zed.
Ranged>Melee notice how riot doesn't comment at all on the abusive and oppressive nature of Marksmen with item intended for melee champions.

Yet marksmen mains complain that their class is useless, despite the lack of any nerfs. 
Things like this are why I don't give the majority of them respect.
But riot caters to them like they're the privileged minority.

This occurence is literally only because of the lethality changes and Edge of Night just being too damn good. As an ADC main, i wish they'd revert lethality so the boards will stop crying about how "OP" Jhin is now...
Isn't it ironic the marksmen that aren't abusing lethality, are the hybrid ones? lol
yea, well corki magic damage wont be affected by lethality of course. why would you pick a marksmen like him when you could abuse lethality while riot sits around and does nothing?
It's sarcasm, obviously he & ezreal can't entirely benefit from it since significant portions of their kits aren't physical damage.
This isn't an adc meta, this a lethality meta. There just happens to be 5 ADCs that are really good with lethality.

Lethality is what is up. Not enough offensive armor items to stop it. Only classes who can survive it are tanks, and junglers.

 Edit: However one of the biggest changes I did was swap out flat armor runes for Armor/level. That and Tabi with Zhonya's is usually enough to not get blitzed.

If you're losing to a 5-man ADC comp then not only you but your entire is bad at the game.

It's not really 5 man ADC comps, it's just salty people calling it that. 

Something like {{champion:126}}  mid or top.
{{champion:133}}  mid or top
{{champion:104}}  jungle
{{champion:202}}  or {{champion:21}}  ADC
Then whatever's good for support. 

Idea is to abuse lethality hard as hell and end the game before the other team even got started. Because a team with an average of 2-3 items won't beat a comp with the average of 3-4 items that oneshot any squishy target and any tank that doesn't have enough armor. 

Oh an {{champion:92}}  is played top sometimes as well.
What? Marksmen are supposed to be DPS tank shredders and they are using items that shred tanks!? Inconceivable!
Lol that means your team has like no CC at all apparently if you have trouble against a 5 ADC team.
Just because you don't know how to deal with 5adc comps doesn't mean they do well.  As a talon main I pray for 5adc comps because it's just a free buffet for me
Holy this is some top tier circlejerk, I can tell you really put effort into this one.  I bet you will get 100 upvotes for this masterpiece.
